metadata.name: client
metadata.description: Endpoint for dealing with the user's User object - Endpoint: /client/{fingerprint}/

metadata.name: user
metadata.description: Endpoint for fetching data about other users - Endpoint: /user/{id}/

metadata.name: compendium
metadata.description: Endpoint for getting information from the Open5e Compendium - Endpoint: /compendium/

metadata.name: characters
metadata.description: Endpoint for getting character information - Endpoint: /characters/{fingerprint}/
